post.text: Even Bill is tired of the lies, SAD!

comment.author: Taylor
comment.text: I don't think Bill will be alive in 4 years. He looks terrible and yet I think he is the same age as our Future President Donald J. Trump.

replies.author: Forrest
replies.text: It's an interesting point that they are similar in age… The Trump family so full of energy, enthusiasm and excitement… And then this in comparison…
